title: AIIMS Delhi Recruitment 2026 - Apply for Project Research Scientist II Posts
description: All India Institute of Medical Sciences, Delhi (AIIMS Delhi) has declared the latest job notification for 2026. To fill up the vacancies for Project Research Scientist II Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the MBBS, BDS, MDS, Ph.D., B.V.Sc, and M.V.Sc can grab this chance and apply for the AIIMS Delhi Recruitment 2026 . Here, we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible ...
